column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) of the head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with sagittal section. We observe slice n°95 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. We observe the white matter of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 4889.7949 mm³, the cortex of left cerebral hemisphere of volume 5463.2812 mm³, the left lateral ventricle of volume 31.6406 mm³, the temporal horn of left lateral ventricle of volume 6.5918 mm³, the white matter of left hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 235.9863 mm³, the left cerebellar cortex of volume 1464.6973 mm³, the left putamen of volume 146.3379 mm³, the left hippocampus of volume 218.8477 mm³ and the left amygdala of volume 27.6855 mm³ there.
